name: Oasis Defenders
description:
Premise

This is a game for Twitch streamers using the Twitch-chat members to play the game.

Story

Oasis-Ville was a small and peaceful village located by a small lake in the middle of

a vast desert land, when one day disaster stroke.

The dreaded "Pupik boy" came to Oasis-Villewith one goal in mind, Destruction.

the villagers known by the name "Bumboys" must now unite and defeat the Threat. 

Setup

DO NOT SHOW ANY OF THESE FIELDS ON STREAM !

1. Streamer Account Handle - In the Games' Settings menu enter your Twitch streaming account name.

2. Bot Account Handle - Create a new Twitch account for the bot to use.

Next, enter the newly created account handle under this field.

3. OAuth Token -  Get an OAuth Token - from this website (using bot account)  https://twitchapps.com/tmi/

Enter the OAuth Token in the field.

How to play:

Goal:

Kill PupikBoy before all buildings are destroyed.

Commands:

Every chatter may type these commands in order to play the game.

!join - Spawns a villager to join the game.

!Shoot - Villager will seek monster and attack it

!fix - villager will seek a damaged building and fix it.

!hug @[insert username] - villager will hug the specified villager and heal it.

!run - Villager will run away from the monster for a few seconds.  

WASD keys to move the camera. 

Mouse scroll to Zoom in/out.

Mouse movement to rotate.

X key to end the game.
